short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to check the other zone Time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗭𝗼𝗻𝗲 is a versatile Chrome extension designed to simplify time management across different regions. Whether you’re coordinating with international colleagues, scheduling meetings, or planning travel, this extension provides accurate and up-to-date time zone information at your fingertips.

𝑲𝒆𝒚 𝑭𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔:

Real-Time Updates: Get the current time for any location worldwide.
